summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ParentWise Book Summaries website. All 246 book summaries loaded successfully. Backend APIs working perfectly, frontend UI fully functional with theme toggle, category filtering, search, and responsive design.
passed_tests: Categories endpoint - All 12 categories with correct counts
Category filtering - COMM category returns 14 summaries
Summary detail endpoint - Full content with 63,426 characters
Homepage loads with hero section and stats
Theme toggle switches between dark/light mode
Browse page shows 100 summary cards with filtering
Search functionality filters summaries (11 results for 'communication')
Summary detail page displays full markdown content (4942 chars)
Navigation between Home, Browse, Categories pages
Back button returns to previous page
Mobile responsive design with working menu
